Reviews.Title: works greats for hotel/motel business
Reviews.Author: shailesh
Reviews.Content: when i bought this from menards, for extreme business need acually,it is 8 chennel dvr night vision, come with 4 night vision camera.before, i had 4 chennel q-see but , it's only old virsion of recording, not h.265 compression, i have to delet every 8 week to enpty hard drive. now it's better, also i have real time recording , awsome products, first alert is like #1 products in america.First Alert 8 Channel 4 Camera Security Kit 500GB

ProductInfo.Features:
Remote Access via Smartphone or PC
Motion Activated Recording
Indoor/Outdoor
H.264 Compression
Long Ranged Night Vision
ProductInfo.Name: First Alert 8 Channel 4 Camera Security Kit 500GB
